title.narrative: Syria crisis; humanitarian aid; UNHCR's regional operation in response to the Syrian crisis

description.narrative: The UN implements a historically large aid operation in the neighbouring countries to Syria. 55 million refugees have fled from Syria to countries in the region. UN has responded to the Syria crisis with response plans that combine humanitarian assistance and development aid. For 2018 the financing needs for the Regional Refugee + Resilience Plan 3RP that covers both refugees and host communities in Lebanon Jordan Turkey. Iraq and Egypt amount to 44 billion USD. The UNHCR's share of this regional 3RP appeal is 14 billion USD and it also coordinates the component that includes the protection and assistance to refugees.
